dcterms:creator: Will Andrew
Tilo Burghardt
Neill Campbell
Jing Gao
dcterms:description: The Cows2021 dataset is the largest identity-annotated Holstein-Friesian cattle dataset, containing 10,402 RGB images and 301 videos, with labels for localization and identity. It captures the breed's distinctive black and white coat pattern and is designed for self-supervised learning of animal identities.
dcterms:title: Cows2021
